TEXT.P: An age pyramid is a special type of graph used for visualizing the age structure of a population.
Press "Plot Data" to draw an age pyramid for Madagascar.

An age pyramid is simply a bar chart, but turned on its side. The age groups are displayed on the Y-axis. Bars for each age group vary in width (instead of height) depending on the number of individuals in that age group.
Notice that males and females are displayed on different halves of the graph. Males are displayed to the left and females to the right.
